text:
October 29, 1957
Education Television Research
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Gentlemen:
I am Interested In obtaining copies of material
which you may have to offer on the use of television
In teaching. Do you have a reference and price list
of such material which you might send me? I am
enclosing a stamped, self-addressed envelope for your
convenience in replying.
Very truly yours,
Mary W. Hilliard
